word_mean: 发作性睡眠：间断发生的突然嗜睡或无法控制睡意的状态

sentence.Network_en: Related ConditionsSleep paralysis is sometimes associated with narcolepsy.
sentence.Network_cn: 相关症状——睡眠瘫痪有时伴随发作性嗜睡症.

sentence.Network_en: There are also many people who experience Sleep Paralysis without having signs of narcolepsy.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时仍然有大批人的经验仅仅是睡眠瘫痪症,而不伴随有嗜睡症.

sentence.Network_en: Modafinil is a novel central stimulant for the treatment of narcolepsy and idiopathic hypersomnia.
sentence.Network_cn: 莫达非尼是一种新型精神兴奋剂,治疗发作性睡眠症及自发性睡眠过度.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 发作性睡病(narcolepsy)2008-10-29 13:12概述发作性睡病(narcolepsy)是一种原因不明的睡眠障碍,主要表现为在白天突然发生不可抗拒的短期睡眠。多于儿童或青年期.
narcodiagnosis 麻醉诊断法narcolepsy 嗜眠发作narcoma 昏睡
...过仍在梦中却又觉得已经醒来但是却不能动，从而感觉到十分可怕。患发作性睡眠症（narcolepsy）的人可以在日常活动中突然滑入做梦的睡眠，有时竟发展到摔跤使自己受伤的程度，还有睡眠中的呼吸暂.
narcoanalysis 麻醉分析narcolepsy 发自睡病narcology 麻醉学

list.abs: 内感染伴发的精神障碍mental disorder associated with narcolepsy 发作性睡病伴发的精神障碍

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek narkē 'numbness', on the pattern of epilepsy

entry.def: Narcolepsy is a rare medical condition. It causes people who suffer from it to fall into a deep sleep at any time without any warning.

means.word_mean: 1. a sleep disorder characterized by sudden and uncontrollable episodes of deep sleep;

sentences.sentence: "he believes that narcolepsy is attributable to an inability to suppress REM sleep during waking"
